metadata.title: CVE-2024-50340 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: symfony/runtime is a module for the Symphony PHP framework which enablesdecoupling PHP applications from global state. When the`register_argv_argc` php directive is set to `on` , and users call any URLwith a special crafted query string, they are able to change theenvironment or debug mode used by the kernel when handling the request. Asof versions 5.4.46, 6.4.14, and 7.1.7 the `SymfonyRuntime` now ignores the`argv` values for non-SAPI PHP runtimes. All users are advised to upgrade.There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: symfony package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
